params.dx: the amount of tokens the user wants to sell. If the token charges a fee on transfers, use the amount that gets transferred after the fee.
params.tokenIndexFrom: the token the user wants to sell
params.tokenIndexTo: the token the user wants to buy

returns._0: amount of tokens the user will receive

params.amount: Amount in native token decimals to transfer cross-chain pre-fees*
params.chainId: which underlying chain to bridge assets onto
params.to: address on other chain to redeem underlying assets to
params.token: ERC20 compatible token to deposit into the bridge

params.minDy: the min amount the user would like to receive, or revert to only minting the SynERC20 token crosschain.

params.amount: Amount of (typically) LP token to pass to the nodes to attempt to removeLiquidity() with to redeem for the underlying assets of the LP token
params.chainId: which underlying chain to bridge assets onto
params.liqDeadline: Specificies the deadline that the nodes are allowed to try to redeem/swap the LP token*
params.liqMinAmount: Specifies the minimum amount of the underlying asset needed for the nodes to execute the redeem/swap
params.liqTokenIndex: Specifies which of the underlying LP assets the nodes should attempt to redeem for
params.to: address on other chain to redeem underlying assets to
params.token: ERC20 compatible token to deposit into the bridge

calculateSwap(address,uint8,uint8,uint25.notice: Calculate amount of tokens you receive on swap

depositETH(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Wraps SynapseBridge deposit() function to make it compatible w/ ETH -> WETH conversions

depositETHAndSwap(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Wraps SynapseBridge depositAndSwap() function to make it compatible w/ ETH -> WETH conversions

redeemAndRemove(address,uint256,address,.notice: Wraps redeemAndRemove on SynapseBridge Relays to nodes that (typically) a wrapped synAsset ERC20 token has been burned and the underlying needs to be redeeemed on the native chain. This function indicates to the nodes that they should attempt to redeem the LP token for the underlying assets (E.g "swap" out of the LP token)

redeemAndSwap(address,uint256,address,ui.notice: Wraps redeemAndSwap on SynapseBridge.sol Relays to nodes that (typically) a wrapped synAsset ERC20 token has been burned and the underlying needs to be redeeemed on the native chain. This function indicates to the nodes that they should attempt to redeem the LP token for the underlying assets (E.g "swap" out of the LP token)
